meanings.definition: A person who advocates or takes part in a revolution.
meanings.sent1: The revolutionists gathered in the square to protest peacefully.
meanings.sent2: The history books are filled with stories of brave revolutionists fighting for change.
meanings.sent3: The revolutionists decided to have a dance-off instead of a protest.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like a spark that ignited the minds of the revolutionists.
meanings.sent5: The image of the revolutionists waving flags will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of revolutionists.
meanings.sent1: The revolutionary speech was filled with passion and inspired the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The flag they carried had a revolutionary symbol that represented their cause.
meanings.sent3: The revolutionary cupcakes were decorated with tiny protest signs.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a revolutionary spark that captivated everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The revolutionary music echoed through the streets, stirring up emotions in all who heard it.
